SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT PRD010.PLN_CD , PRD010.DDMMYYYY , PRD010.DAY_WEK , PRD010.OPE_TYP , PRD010.WEEK_NO , PRD010.PRD_I_CATE , PRD010.PRD_I_DATE , PRD010.MRP_I_CATE , PRD010.MRP_I_DATE FROM PRD010 WHERE ( PRD010.PLN_CD LIKE '__AE' OR PRD010.PLN_CD LIKE '__AF') AND PRD010.PRD_I_CATE = 'X' AND ( PRD010.PRD_I_DATE IS NULL OR PRD010.PRD_I_DATE = '00000000') ORDER BY PRD010.PLN_CD , PRD010.DDMMYYYY

INSERT INTO PRD005 ( ENT_DAT , ENT_TIM , USR_ID , UPD_FRE , EF_TYP , SHA_NO , VIN_TYP , F_MARK , VIN_CD , MTOCD , EFM , MTONAM , COL_CD , COLI_CD , SLS_MTO , KDLOT , E_MTOCD , E_EFM , IND_DAT , PLN_DAT , PLN_SEQ , PLN_SFX , PRD_LIN, OEM_CAT, REP_CAT ) VALUES ( ':1' , TO_DATE (':2' , 'HH24:MI:SS') , ':3' , 1 ,NVL( ':4',' ') , :5 ,NVL( ':6',' ') ,NVL(':7',' ') ,NVL( ':8',' ') ,NVL( ':9',' ') ,NVL( ':10',' ') ,NVL( ':11',' ') ,NVL( ':12',' ') ,NVL( ':13',' ') ,NVL( ':14',' ') ,NVL( ':15',' ') ,NVL( ':16',' ') ,NVL( ':17',' ') ,NVL( ':1',' ') ,NVL( ':18',' ') , :19 , :20 ,NVL( ':21',' '),NVL(':22',' '),NVL(':23',' '))

UPDATE PRD010 SET PRD010.UPD_DAT = TO_CHAR ( SYSDATE , 'YYYYMMDD') , PRD010.UPD_TIM = SYSDATE , PRD010.USR_ID = NVL (':1' , ' ') , PRD010.TERM_ID = :2 , PRD010.UPD_FRE = MOD ( PRD010.UPD_FRE , 999) + 1 , PRD010.PRD_I_DATE = TO_CHAR ( SYSDATE , 'YYYYMMDD') WHERE PRD010.PLN_CD = ':3' AND PRD010.DDMMYYYY=':4' AND PRD010.PRD_I_CATE = 'X' AND ( PRD010.PRD_I_DATE IS NULL OR PRD010.PRD_I_DATE = '00000000')
SELECT PRD010.PRD_I_DATE FROM PRD010 WHERE PRD010.PLN_CD = ':1' AND PRD010.DDMMYYYY = ':2' AND ( PRD010.PRD_I_DATE IS NULL OR PRD010.PRD_I_DATE = '00000000')
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PRD010 WHERE (PLN_CD LIKE '__AE' OR PLN_CD LIKE '__AF') AND PRD_I_CATE = 'X' AND PRD_I_DATE = '00000000'

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT DDMMYYYY,OPE_TYP,PRD_I_CATE,PLN_CD FROM PRD010 WHERE PLN_CD LIKE('__AF') AND DDMMYYYY>=(SELECT MIN(DDMMYYYY) FROM PRD010 WHERE PLN_CD LIKE('__AF') AND PRD_I_CATE='X' AND PRD_I_DATE='00000000') AND DDMMYYYY<=(SELECT MAX(DDMMYYYY) FROM PRD010 WHERE PLN_CD LIKE('__AF') AND PRD_I_CATE='X' AND PRD_I_DATE='00000000') UNION ALL SELECT DDMMYYYY,OPE_TYP,PRD_I_CATE,PLN_CD FROM PRD010 WHERE PLN_CD LIKE('__AE') AND DDMMYYYY>=(SELECT MIN(DDMMYYYY) FROM PRD010 WHERE PLN_CD LIKE('__AE') AND PRD_I_CATE='X'AND PRD_I_DATE='00000000') AND DDMMYYYY<=(SELECT MAX(DDMMYYYY) FROM PRD010 WHERE PLN_CD LIKE('__AE') AND PRD_I_CATE='X' AND PRD_I_DATE='00000000')) WHERE OPE_TYP<>0 AND PRD_I_CATE<>'X'

Text.valUnicode: THE RANGE OF INDICATION DAY IS NOT CONTINUOUS.
